entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Peawanuck
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:46 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -34.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peawanuck Airport 12:00 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -34.1°C
Pressure: 101.1 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -46
Dewpoint: -37.5°C
Wind: WNW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Light snow ending early this evening then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 49 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 29.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 29. Wind chill minus 50 in the morning and minus 40 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
